Topic.Title: How to get a media.textadventures.co/uk link?

Posts.EditableText: How to get a media.textadventures.co/uk link?

After publishing your game, click on the "Play" button.

That takes you to your game on `media.textadventures.co.uk`.

Is that what you were looking for?

Posts.EditableText:
If  the file is inside your game, the link should be the same as the one for the game itself.

So  if you play a game and it gives you an address like:
```
http://media.textadventures.co.uk/games/tvbRARoUSES9Gs0xJLNPjg/index.html
```
any images which are inside the game's zip will be accessible as:
```
http://media.textadventures.co.uk/games/tvbRARoUSES9Gs0xJLNPjg/imagename.png
```

This means that in most cases, you can use a relative URI (just the filename).
I've not really played with this, as I haven't got around to installing the desktop version yet. But I'm sure someone who has it can help you.
